name: CYANiDE
description:
Set up stages by setting balance levers. When you're ready, touch the ELECTROPOST and convert yourself into an ELECTROBALL so you can safely roll to the GOAL.

Fifteen single-screen stages. AND IT IS ALL CYAN.

Press X to jump. Press V to restart a level.

NOTE: This is an experimental platformer. The jump is intentionally exaggerated and strange and the balance platforms are glitchable.
